description: It follows new advice stating all travellers arriving in the island must self-isolate for 14 days.
title: Coronavirus: Blue Islands cancels flights to Guernsey
title_page: Coronavirus: Blue Islands cancels flights to Guernsey - BBC News
maintext: "We stand by the States of Guernsey and Government of Jersey's policies to control the spread of Covid-19, the health of our islands is the responsibility of the whole community."
